import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Divider } from 'bumbag';

# Divider

## Import

```jsx
import { Divider } from 'bumbag'
```

## Usage

```jsx-live
<Divider />
```

### Vertical

```jsx-live
<Flex>
  Hello
  <Divider orientation="vertical" />
  World
</Flex>
```
